lead_paragraph: Chesapeake Energy jumped 6.8 percent on word that United States stockpiles of crude oil fell sharply last week.

headline.print_headline: Surge in Crude Oil Prices Fuels Rally on Wall Street
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Higher, Led by Energy and Bank Stocks
